transcript.text:
￼



















































Version 11.1 Release Notes
Admin Section

12 min
strong password setup in version 11 1, as admin you can now choose the password strength for your customers account for the configuration, you will find a new setting " password strength for front customer " in site settings where you can choose the strength as low, medium or strong for admin accounts, the password strength will be set as “medium” by default once you have setup the strength for the password, the customers will receive warning message if the password they have entered does not match the strength introducing all new editor in version 11 1, we are bringing new editor to enhance the writing and editing experience for our psps the editor will provide you an intuitive and powerful platform to create impactful website content seamlessly, setting a new standard for rich text editing experiences draft mode development whether you're working on a lengthy document, composing an email, or drafting a social media post, having the ability to save your progress ensures that you don't lose any of your work in case of interruptions or distractions to ensure due accessibility of your content and save a work in progress, version 11 1 introduces draft mode in the admin panel, when you access the editor for writing any content, you can find an edit icon in the tool bar as soon as you start writing anything in between the content addition, you can save the content as draft and come back later to complete the remaining content addition and save the content using the save button as soon as you save the content added in the editor, the system will generate a version for the same the system will create and store upto 3 versions for the content you can anytime switch to any of the versions when you switch to any versions, the current content will be lost and replaced with the content associated with the selected version short link generation for sharing products with v11 1 release, admin as well as customers will be able to copy and share the product short links from the price calculator to simplify the configuration and usage of this feature, the sitemap menu has been revamped to seperate the tabs for sitemap, google feeds, facebook feeds and product feed variants you can now select and generate feeds for google and facebook from their respective tabs for generating the product variants for shopping feeds you can move to the product feed variant tab the short links can be generated for product option combinations as well for generating product feed manually, you can do so from the price calculator screen front store on the front store, the customers will be able to share the shortlink of the selected product variant with their friends, family or colleague via share product link available in the price calculator clicking on share product link will allow the customers to copy the link and then share it with their people from the same pop up, customers can send or receive the cost estimation of selected product via email or even download it in pdf format for reference note display of estimation block in the share product configuration pop up is based on the " enable 'send mail' functionality in price calculator " site setting minor enhancements user wise report fields display and export in the report field settings screen of report section, the super admin can now select and save the fields for display and export for self or for all the admins add help for product quantity field with the “product quantity label help” field added in the product wise label personalization of the product setting, the admin can now add some message for their customers to help them with the quantity selection once the message is added in the space provided, on the front store, the message will be displayed in a help popup within the price calculator two more sizes in schema manager size selection expanding the unit size selection in the schema manager section of imposition module, two new options “feet” and “meter” have been added restrict site access for an entire ip range on the manage site access page, admins can allow or block access to a site for an entire range of ip addresses
Did this page help you?
